title: Add a site-wide scrolling notice/ticker message in the header

requirements.text: Add a prominent, site-wide scrolling notice/ticker (marquee-style) at the top of the website (in the shared header layout) that continuously scrolls left-to-right or right-to-left and displays an English daily-update message indicating users do not need to update and should visit daily for new updates (e.g., "No need to update — visit here daily for new updates."). The ticker must be visible on both the homepage and post detail pages and remain readable and mobile-friendly.

quotes: ऊपर एक पोस्ट चलना चाहिए जिस पर लिखा होना चाहिए नहीं पड़ती अपडेट करने के लिए यहां पर रोज आता है

acceptanceCriteria: A scrolling ticker/notice bar appears within the shared header area so it is visible on all routes (e.g., '/' and '/post/:postId').
The ticker text is in English and conveys: no need to update; visit daily for updates.
The ticker continuously animates (marquee-like) and is readable on mobile (no clipped text; adequate contrast).
The ticker does not break the existing sticky header behavior and does not cause layout shift that hides page content behind the header.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not edit frontend immutable hook/entry files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Use English for any user-facing text added by this change.
nonGoals: Adding new backend data fields or changing the existing JobPost schema.
Adding an admin panel/CMS to update ticker text.
Adding third-party integrations (ads, analytics, external auth).
